HELP: CV..................Downloads a copy of my resumé
CLEAR...............Resets the terminal to initial window
HEADER..............Sets the header for the terminal
THEME...............Sets the colour scheme for the terminal
For help about the settings, type HELP <CMD>, e.g. HELP THEME.
